TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lohok, title = Lohok, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lohok} }

S.FORM: Lohok Itiniay i Yuli Cen no Hualien ko Lohok a niyaro', 289 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 791 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 63% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 499 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 37% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 292 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 59%, Bunun 1%, Truku 1%, roma 2%.

Lohok Itiniay i Yoli Cen no Hoalien ko Lohok a niyaro', 289 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 791 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 63% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 499 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 37% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 292 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 59%, Bonon 1%, Troko 1%, roma 2%.
